text: Czesław Baran (25 August 1937 – 2 March 2021) was a Polish politician and agronomist. He was born in Pietrusy, Poland. Baran was a member of the United People's Party. From 1985 until 1989, he was a member of the Sejm. Baran died on 2 March 2021 in Siedlce, Poland at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish politicians
title: Czesław Baran
